Package it.polimi.ingsw.network.client.view.gui

Class ApplicationGUI

java.lang.Object
javafx.application.Application
it.polimi.ingsw.network.client.view.gui.ApplicationGUI
All Implemented Interfaces:
ClientApplication, View
public class ApplicationGUI extends javafx.application.Application implements View, ClientApplication
ApplicationGUI runs and represents the client in a Graphical User interface
